channel.title: svg on 不三之选

item.title: svg标签
item.description:
svg 介绍

不会翻译，照抄过来的。 SVG is short for Scalable Vector Graphics. It is a graphic format in which the shapes are specified in XML. The XML is then rendered by an SVG viewer. Today most web browser can display SVG just like they can display PNG, GIF, and JPG.
